tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InsuranceAgents (
  agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_name VARCHAR(50),
  supervisor_id INT,
  hire_date DATE,
  performance_score FLOAT,
  incentive_scheme VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE incentives (
    incentive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incentive_name VARCHAR(50),
    incentive_description TEXT,
    incentive_type VARCHAR(50),
    incentive_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE agent_performance (
    agent_id INT,
    performance_date DATE,
    performance_score FLOAT,
    PRIMARY KEY (agent_id, performance_date),
    FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agents (
    agent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    metric_value FLOAT,
    metric_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE agent_performance_mapping (
    mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agent_id INT,
    metric_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (metric_id) REFERENCES performance_metrics(metric_id)
);

CREATE TABLE policies (
  policy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_type VARCHAR(50),
  policy_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  policy_start_date DATE,
  agent_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id)
);

CREATE TABLE performance (
  performance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  agent_id INT,
  policy_id INT,
  policy_issued_date DATE,
  sales_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (policy_id) REFERENCES policies(policy_id)
);

CREATE TABLE agent_incentives (
  agent_id INT,
  incentive_id INT,
  incentive_paid DECIMAL(10, 2),
  PRIMARY KEY (agent_id, incentive_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (agent_id) REFERENCES agents(agent_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (incentive_id) REFERENCES incentives(incentive_id)
);
